chapter.title: Enabling Accessibility Tools
chapter.para: You must enable the assistive technology services before you are able to use many of the accessibility tools available.

step.para: Select Enable assistive technologies and then press Close and Log Out.
Log back in. The assistive technology services will be started automatically.

chapter.para: Once basic assistive technology support is enabled, it is possible to start accessibility services such as the screenreader, screen magnifier and on-screen keyboard.
